name: Runner (itch) (riphuntervs)
description:
Runner Pre-Alpha 0.2.5 is released ! (UPDATE)

Full changelog: 

     -Added Music 

     -Added a Pause Menu 

     -Some other minor changes

The Runner, a game currently in Early Access. This is my first game so please give me feedback so I can improve. It is a 3D simple platformer but I am warning you that the next levels I add will be really hard, although the first one is not too easy either. I will be updating this game regularly. (Made in Unity)
